divs: Sighting DetailsIt's happened a few times, I usually forget after it happens, kinda like a dream? I guess is the best way to describe it. But I reported to Roger Marsh that I had seen a flash of blueish greenish light in the sky. It illuminates the sky for not even a couple of seconds, it can repeat, but there is no consistency to how it occurs. The one night I reported it may have been the forth or fifth time it has happened. Now it occurs late at night, and no noise is apparent. Just a flashing light, not concentrated in one area, just seemed to brighten the whole sky. I have no idea what it was, and have even forgotten about it, but the last time i saw it, I googled it and that is my story at this time. Im in lower Bucks county PA anybody with a similar story I'd love to hear it. The feeling when it happens is that of stop, look around, the hair stands up on your arm, and again no logical explanation.
Summary: flash of greenish blueish light lasting few seconds, happens 2 to 3 times sporadically every couple months
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Feasterville
There were no other sightings in Feasterville on or around January 31st 2010
